text: Ndithudi Ife tidamupatsa Mose Buku, ndipo iye atachoka, Ife tidatumiza Atumwi ena. Ndipo tidamupatsa Yesu, mwana wa Maria, zizindikiro zooneka ndi maso ndipo tidamulimbikitsa iye ndi Mzimu Woyera. Kodi nthawi ili yonse imene Aneneri amabwera ndi zimene mitima yanu siifuna mumadzikweza? Gulu lina mumalikana ndipo gulu lina mumalipha
